---

description: An overview of contribution templates
---

### Where to edit
#### Writers

https://markdownlivepreview.com/

Copy the changes into a .md (markdown) file, create a post in the [Discord](https://discord.gg/fqRBzQWVfK) and upload the markdown file for review.

#### Website editors

https://code.visualstudio.com/
Visit our GitHub repository to start editing
Alternatively, our contribute guide explains a different option to edit with Netlify.


Here are a collection of templates that you can use when proposing contributions.
